name: Hourglass (ToughDove02)
description:
All the joys of owning a real hourglass, without the hassle!

Infinite Replayability: Each hourglass has a unique set of 630 procedurally generated grains of sand!  Endless FUN!

Compact: This hourglass is two dimensional, so it takes up ZERO floor or counter space!

No Assembly Required.
